"* Aerobic exercise such as walking,swimming,running reduces the urge to smoke.

" "* Physical activity strengthens your heart and lungs.

" "* Withdrawal symptoms and cravings for cigarettes decreases during exercise and upto" "50 minutes after exercising.

" "* Exercise help you cope with stress and have some energy and it also improves your mood.

" "* Mind-body practices such as yoga and meditation have the potential to aid smoking" "cessation and become an alternative drug-free treatment.

" "* Back, neck, arm stretch relaxes muscles in your body.

" "* Drink atleast 8 glass of water per day, as it gives us energy.

" "* Replace alcohol with non-alcoholic drinks.

" "* Drink herbal teas during day.

" "* Eat green vegetables and fruits as they have low calories, avoid eating sweets.

" "* Try sugarless gum, mint.

" "* Take a warm bath ,it helps body to relax and sleep better.
